DOC.brief_summary: Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm ( AAA ) potentially life threaten condition . If aneurysm rupture , mortality high 80 % . This study assess feasibility proper visceral renal artery catheterization use 3D model obtain pre-procedural computed tomographic angiography ( CTA ) , fuse real-time fluoroscopy , without contrast injection angiographic run-offs thus minimize contrast use patient radiation exposure achieve procedure success Advanced EVAR .
DOC.brief_title: Image Fusion Preprocedural CTA With Real Time Fluoroscopy Enhance EVAR Repair
